title: Purchased Ashen Lord Aurelion Sol Bundle Wrong RP
body: Purchased the Ashen Lord Aurelion Sol Bundle and got charged 1837Rp for it. Can I get my RP refunded to it original price of 1350?

replies.body:
Hey there,

The only way to refund purchases is to use one of your 3 refund tokens, see [this KB article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ#h2q1) for information on how to use your refund tokens.

If you no longer have any refund tokens left then you're unable to receive a refund for any purchases made, no matter the reason, unless the error was on Riots end of course.

The current advertised cost of the bundle is not 1350 and is 1837

http://puu.sh/nSOn1/b7ebe81475.jpg
